description: Full of Mexican spices, these beef burgers pack quite the kick.
name: Gluten Free Tex-Mex Burger Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 medium red chilli, de-seeded and sliced
1 medium green chilli, de-seeded and sliced
1 medium red onion, peeled and diced
4 medium gluten free buns, sliced in half

recipeInstructions.text: In a bowl, mix together the beef, bread crumbs, spices, chillies, onion and egg.
Divide the mixture into 4 patties and pack tightly.
Heat up a pan to a medium heat and then add the oil.
Fry the burgers for 6 minutes, flip and fry for a further 6 minutes.
Lightly toast the buns and serve with the burgers, salsa and cheese.
